info.title: AP Breaking News API
info.description: AP Breaking News API allows your organization to retrieve a list of available breaking news categories and then request content for a specific category.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned content item data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The GUID of a content item (not case-sensitive).

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API key

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename for the downloaded content item rendition, in the format

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The GUID of a content item (not case-sensitive).

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: The content media type. The default for AP Images  (including all GraphicsBank content) is photo.

parameters.name: rendition
parameters.description: The content item rendition.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: arrivalDate
parameters.description: The date when the content item was released, in the format  YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ where the value must be in Coordinated Universal Time  (UTC). B

parameters.name: contentSet
parameters.description: The AP Images content set to be searched.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of search results per page. The default is 25 results with a  maximum of 100 per page

parameters.name: creationDate
parameters.description: The date when the content item was created, in the format  YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ where the value must be in Coordinated Universal Time  (UTC).

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: One or more words from the title of a specific event.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: One or more image ID numbers assigned to content items.

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: A geographic location in the AP Geography vocabulary.

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: The content media type (photo, graphic, video)

parameters.name: metadataLevel
parameters.description: The level of metadata to be included in search results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number within the set of search results. The default is 1.

parameters.name: person
parameters.description: The name of a person who is featured in the content item.

parameters.name: photographer
parameters.description: The photographers first and/or last name.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query

parameters.name: showParametrics
parameters.description: By default, query facets that allow you to refine the original  search are returned for each content item at the entry level only.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Specifies how to sort the search results.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: One or more content creators.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Subject category in the AP Subject vocabulary.

parameters.name: transref
parameters.description: Transmission reference number.

get.description: Returns a list of changes to the AP vocabulary terms according to the specified criteria.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: authority

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: This parameter can be used in conjunction with the startdate parameter to  specify a date range. The date must be in the format yyyy-mm-dd. If  enddate is included in the request, startdate must also be specified.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specifies the output format: comma-separated values (CSV) or XML. If no  format is specified as the format parameter value or in the Accept header,  XML is returned.

parameters.name: lastversion
parameters.description: Returns all change logs since (but not including) the specified version  number, in the format {AuthorityVersion}.{Revision}.

parameters.name: startdate
parameters.description: eturns all change logs since (and including) the specified date. The date  must be in the format yyyy-mm-dd. This parameter can be used in  conjunction with the enddate parameter to specify a date range.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Returns the change log for the specified version number, in the format  {AuthorityVersion}.{Revision} where {AuthorityVersion} is the authority  version found in the AP Tagging Service output for each applied term.

get.description: Returns the AP ontology definition for the specified AP property or class and the specified format.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: The name of an AP property or class

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned AP ontology data. If no format  is specified as the format parameter value or in the Accept  header, RDF/XML is returned.

get.description: Returns a list of deprecated AP vocabulary terms in the specified format for the AP Company authority  or for the other four AP authorities.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned taxonomy data (RDF/XML, RDF/TTL or  NewsML-G2). If no format is specified as the format parameter  value or in the Accept header, RDF/XML is returned.

get.description: Returns a list of deprecated AP vocabulary terms in the specified format for the AP Company authority  or for the other four AP authorities.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned taxonomy data (RDF/XML, RDF/TTL or  NewsML-G2). If no format is specified as the format parameter  value or in the Accept header, RDF/XML is returned.

get.description: Returns the taxonomy information for the specified authority and the specified format.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: The name of a classification authority (not case-sensitive).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned taxonomy data. If no format is  specified as the format parameter value or in the Accept  header, RDF/XML is returned.

get.description: Returns a document for the specified authority and format with the AP vocabulary data for the  specified term GUID and the subset of the vocabulary located below the specified term.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: The name of a classification authority (not case-sensitive).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned taxonomy data. If no format is  specified as the format parameter value or in the Accept header,  RDF/XML is returned.

parameters.name: GUID
parameters.description: The GUID of an AP term below which the returned taxonomy data  subset is located in the AP taxonomy hierarchy. The GUID is not case-sensitive

get.description: Returns the taxonomy information for the specified GUID of an AP term and the specified format.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned taxonomy data. If no format is  specified as the format parameter value or in the Accept  header, RDF/XML is returned.

parameters.name: GUID
parameters.description: The GUID of an AP term (not case-sensitive).

post.description: Returns the set of AP standardized vocabulary terms that apply to the submitted news content. The  output can be limited to one or more authorities specified in the request; for example, you can choose  to apply only AP Organization, AP Subject and AP Geography tags to the submitted content, but not  AP Person or AP Company.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: story
parameters.description: URL-encoded content  submitted for tagging.

get.description: Returns a list of available AP Breaking News categories, including category IDs.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

get.description: Returns the latest content for a specific category. Depending on the specified parameters, returns  either the full story for each headline and/or the headlines linked to web pages with the full stories.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: categoryID
parameters.description: The ID of the AP Breaking News category. Use the Category List method to  get the list of available categories and their IDs.

parameters.name: contentOption
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return full story content in the response.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of content items to be returned. Ten items are returned by  default. The maximum allowed value is 25.

parameters.name: mediaOption
parameters.description: Includes related photos in the response.
